forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Drizzle. Mostly cloudy. Low around 47, with temperatures rising to around 49 overnight. South wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Drizzle before 10am, then rain. Cloudy. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. South southeast wind 9 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

weather_report:
In the heart of San Francisco, twilight settles gently into the night, draping the city in a cloak of low-hanging clouds and the promise of rain. The drizzle whispers against the pavement, a rhythmic lullaby, as the temperature begins its subtle ascent, lulling the senses into a cozy embrace. A south wind carries the salt-kissed air from the bay, brushing past with a hint of intrigue, while the looming cloud cover envelops the iconic skyline and softens the sharp edges of the cityscape. 

As dawn approaches, the promise of a gray day unfolds. Drizzle will persist, morphing into a steadier rain, wrapping the streets in a shimmering wet veil. The atmosphere, heavy yet comforting, calls for layers—perhaps a thick sweater beneath a waterproof jacket, accompanied by sturdy shoes to navigate the slick sidewalks. With such weather, the outdoors may feel less inviting; however, the warmth of a local café offers an excellent alternative. Picture yourself nestled by a window, coffee in hand, watching the world blur slightly through the glass. Perhaps an art exhibit or a stroll through a bookstore will suit the mood, where the indoors can become an oasis while the city dances in the rain outside.
